== Description ==
Creates the default links, first post and comment, first page and then finishes with some tidying up.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$blog_id|integer|The blog id to setup.}}
{{Parameter|$user_id|integer|The user id to attribute the new information to.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(null)</tt>

== Usage ==
%%%<?php install_blog_defaults($blog_id, $user_id); ?>%%%
